events.message: Customer reported their vehicle was involved in a collision on March 14th at 5 PM near downtown.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident based on the keywords and incident description.
Agent John Doe was assigned to handle the auto accident claim promptly for effective processing.
The customer was sent a confirmation email acknowledging receipt of the auto accident claim filed.
The claims team requested copies of the police report and photographs of the vehicle damage.
Customer submitted all requested documents, including police report and photos of the damaged car.
Investigation into the auto accident claim was initiated to verify details and assess damages.
Investigation concluded confirming fault and verifying all submitted documents in the claim.
A settlement proposal covering the vehicle repairs was sent to the customer for review and approval.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and appreciated the quick handling.
The auto accident claim was officially approved following acceptance of the settlement proposal.
Payment to cover the vehicle repairs was issued promptly by the insurance company.
The auto accident claim has been closed after completion of all formalities and payment issuance.
